data.name: WORLD END ECONOMiCA Complete Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
WORLD END ECONOMiCA Complete Soundtrack contains the complete soundtrack for the WORLD END ECONOMiCA trilogy.

Spread across 4 Discs for a total of 96 tracks, the soundtrack features all the music from each game including the opening themes performed by Kishida Kyoudan & the Akeboshi Rockets and the ending themes performed by Kiyono. The soundtrack is available in both MP3 and FLAC formats.

Tracklist

Disc 1
01. Ride a Bull
02. Singing on Sixth Avenue
03. Hagana's Theme
04. Lisa's Theme
05. Haru's Theme
06. Downtown
07. Shine City
08. Walking
09. The Great Escape
10. Under the net
11. A Calm Day
12. Walking the sunday's street
13. world end economica
14. Buy Buy Buy
15. Is it like a tea pot
16. Day time
17. Last 10mins.
18. Tales of Panties
19. Break Street
20. No one can stop me
21. Deep Space
22. Palace party
23. Decision
24. Restlessness
25. Gazing at the Earth
26. Sola
27. Dreaming Night
28. Behind the Enduring Wellspring
29. End of his young days
30. Gymnopedie

Disc 2
01. Piano Sonata No. 8 in C minor, Op. 13
02. Fractals in leaves
03. Chris's Theme
04. Rain, Sad Rain
05. Eleanor's Theme
06. Elegant Tea Party
07. Friendly Days
08. Town for Shopping
09. Spark and Bright
10. Fun Fun Fun
11. Soft Time
12. Depth of Thought
13. M.M.
14. Another Ambitous
15. Alhambra
16. Happy Street
17. Midnight Moon
18. Tragedy
19. Balance
20. Glass w-ice
21. Place Pray for God
22. Doubt
23. Beyond This Universe
24. Ice Break
25. Tension
26. Patience, Impatience
27. Desire

Disc 3
01. Balmy Day
02. Hop on the hill
03. Good Old Days
04. U FINE
05. Rhapsody
06. The Club
07. Evening
08. Office
09. Starting Business
10. Impatience
11. Heart Beat Hard
12. Wondaring World
13. Dear Old Friends
14. 0101 digit
15. The madness of the madness
16. Triumphant Return
17. Your Lost
18. Northern Barrier of the Moon
19. The courage to go on and on and on...
20. Accident
21. Xover
22. Core
23. Amazing Grace for Chris
24. Sprint
25. On the Stage
26. regret or...
27. Overlap of Past and Present
28. Big Boss
29. Termination
30. Starting Over
31. DailyWork

Disc 4
01. World End Economica (Episode 1 Opening)
02. retrograde interior (Episode 1 Ending)
03. cause to decide (Episode 2 Opening)
04. escape from predicament (Episode 2 Ending)
05. Moonlight Innocence (Episode 3 Opening)
06. not bound (Episode 3 Ending)
07. Alchemy
08. actable luna

Soundtrack Composed by: Matsumoto Fuminori, Saadai
Disc 1, Track 30 composed by Eric Satie
Disc 2, Track 1 composed by Ludwig Van Beethoven

WEE OP Themes (Disc 4, Track 1, 3, 5, 7)
Performed by: Kishida Kyoudan & the Akeboshi Rockets

WEE ED Themes (Disc 4, Track 2, 4, 6, 8)
Composed by: -PF AUDIO-
Vocal: kiyono

Spicy Tails is a development group lead by Isuna Hasekura, author of the popular "Spice and Wolf" series as well as the manga series "Billionaire Girl." The World End Economica series of visual novels were brought to the West via Kickstarter as a joint project between Spicy Tails and Sekai Project.

data.short_description: Complete soundtrack to all three episodes of WORLD END ECONOMiCA. Spread across 4 discs and 96 tracks, this soundtrack features many memorable songs including the opening and ending themes.

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy WORLD END ECONOMiCA Complete Soundtrack
